entity.query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT IM.ITEM_NO AS ITEM_NO, IM.ITEM_NAME AS ITEM_NAME, BR.BRAND_NAME AS BRAND, ST.DESCRIPTION AS STATUS, RS_DETAILS.iteM_REBATE_START_DATE AS ITEMSTART, RS_DETAILS.ITEM_REBATE_END_DATE AS ITEM_END, '' AS FORMULA_TYPE, FORMULA.FORMULA_NO AS FORMULA_ID, FORMULA.FORMULA_DESC AS FORMULA_NAME, RL.REBATE_PLAN_ID AS REBATE_PID, RL.REBATE_PLAN_NAME AS REBATE_PNAME, RS_DETAILS.REBATE_AMOUNT AS RE_AMNT, RS_DETAILS.BUNDLE_NO BUNDLE_NO, RS_DETAILS.RS_CONTRACT_ATTACHED_DATE AS ATT_DATE, IM.ITEM_MASTER_SID, RS_CONT.RS_CONTRACT_SID FROM RS_CONTRACT RS_CONT JOIN RS_CONTRACT_DETAILS RS_DETAILS ON RS_CONT.RS_CONTRACT_SID = RS_DETAILS.RS_CONTRACT_SID AND RS_DETAILS.RS_CONTRACT_SID LIKE '?' AND ( RS_CONT.RS_TYPE LIKE '?' OR RS_CONT.RS_TYPE IS NULL ) AND ( RS_CONT.REBATE_PROGRAM_TYPE LIKE '?' OR RS_CONT.REBATE_PROGRAM_TYPE IS NULL ) AND ( RS_CONT.RS_CATEGORY LIKE '?' OR RS_CONT.RS_CATEGORY IS NULL ) AND ( RS_CONT.PAYMENT_FREQUENCY LIKE '?' OR RS_CONT.PAYMENT_FREQUENCY IS NULL ) AND ( RS_CONT.REBATE_PLAN_LEVEL LIKE '?' OR RS_CONT.REBATE_PLAN_LEVEL IS NULL ) LEFT JOIN ITEM_MASTER IM ON IM.ITEM_MASTER_SID = RS_DETAILS.ITEM_MASTER_SID LEFT JOIN BRAND_MASTER BR ON BR.BRAND_MASTER_SID = IM.BRAND_MASTER_SID LEFT JOIN HELPER_TABLE ST ON ST.HELPER_TABLE_SID = IM.ITEM_STATUS LEFT JOIN FORMULA_DETAILS_MASTER FORMULA ON FORMULA.FORMULA_ID = RS_DETAILS.FORMULA_ID LEFT JOIN REBATE_PLAN_MASTER RL ON RL.REBATE_PLAN_MASTER_SID = RS_DETAILS.REBATE_PLAN_MASTER_SID ? ) A

SELECT DISTINCT IM.ITEM_NO AS ITEM_NO, IM.ITEM_NAME AS ITEM_NAME, BR.BRAND_NAME AS BRAND, ST.DESCRIPTION AS STATUS, RS_DETAILS.iteM_REBATE_START_DATE AS ITEMSTART, RS_DETAILS.ITEM_REBATE_END_DATE AS ITEM_END, '' AS FORMULA_TYPE, FORMULA.FORMULA_NO AS FORMULA_ID, FORMULA.FORMULA_DESC AS FORMULA_NAME, RL.REBATE_PLAN_ID AS REBATE_PID, RL.REBATE_PLAN_NAME AS REBATE_PNAME, RS_DETAILS.REBATE_AMOUNT AS RE_AMNT, RS_DETAILS.BUNDLE_NO BUNDLE_NO, RS_DETAILS.RS_CONTRACT_ATTACHED_DATE AS ATT_DATE, IM.ITEM_MASTER_SID, RS_CONT.RS_CONTRACT_SID FROM RS_CONTRACT RS_CONT JOIN RS_CONTRACT_DETAILS RS_DETAILS ON RS_CONT.RS_CONTRACT_SID = RS_DETAILS.RS_CONTRACT_SID AND RS_DETAILS.RS_CONTRACT_SID LIKE '?' AND ( RS_CONT.RS_TYPE LIKE '?' OR RS_CONT.RS_TYPE IS NULL ) AND ( RS_CONT.REBATE_PROGRAM_TYPE LIKE '?' OR RS_CONT.REBATE_PROGRAM_TYPE IS NULL ) AND ( RS_CONT.RS_CATEGORY LIKE '?' OR RS_CONT.RS_CATEGORY IS NULL ) AND ( RS_CONT.PAYMENT_FREQUENCY LIKE '?' OR RS_CONT.PAYMENT_FREQUENCY IS NULL ) AND ( RS_CONT.REBATE_PLAN_LEVEL LIKE '?' OR RS_CONT.REBATE_PLAN_LEVEL IS NULL ) LEFT JOIN ITEM_MASTER IM ON IM.ITEM_MASTER_SID = RS_DETAILS.ITEM_MASTER_SID LEFT JOIN BRAND_MASTER BR ON BR.BRAND_MASTER_SID = IM.BRAND_MASTER_SID LEFT JOIN HELPER_TABLE ST ON ST.HELPER_TABLE_SID = IM.ITEM_STATUS LEFT JOIN FORMULA_DETAILS_MASTER FORMULA ON FORMULA.FORMULA_ID = RS_DETAILS.FORMULA_ID LEFT JOIN REBATE_PLAN_MASTER RL ON RL.REBATE_PLAN_MASTER_SID = RS_DETAILS.REBATE_PLAN_MASTER_SID ? ORDER BY IM.ITEM_MASTER_SID OFFSET ? ROWS FETCH NEXT ? ROWS ONLY

SELECT DISTINCT RS_CONT.RS_ID, RS_CONT.RS_NO, RS_CONT.RS_NAME, ST.DESCRIPTION, TYPE.DESCRIPTION as RS_TYPE, RS_START_DATE, RS_END_DATE, REBATE_FRE.DESCRIPTION AS REBATE_FRE, REBATE_PT.DESCRIPTION AS PROGR_TYPE, REBATE_ca.DESCRIPTION AS RS_CAT, REBATE_fr.DESCRIPTION AS PAY_FRE, REBATE_PL.DESCRIPTION AS REBATE_PLEVEL FROM RS_CONTRACT RS_CONT JOIN HELPER_TABLE TYPE ON TYPE.HELPER_TABLE_SID = RS_CONT.RS_TYPE
JOIN HELPER_TABLE REBATE_FRE ON REBATE_FRE.HELPER_TABLE_SID = RS_CONT.REBATE_FREQUENCY JOIN HELPER_TABLE REBATE_PT ON REBATE_PT.HELPER_TABLE_SID = RS_CONT.REBATE_PROGRAM_TYPE LEFT JOIN HELPER_TABLE ST ON ST.HELPER_TABLE_SID = RS_CONT.RS_STATUS LEFT JOIN HELPER_TABLE REBATE_ca ON REBATE_ca.HELPER_TABLE_SID = RS_CONT.RS_CATEGORY LEFT JOIN HELPER_TABLE REBATE_fr ON REBATE_fr.HELPER_TABLE_SID = RS_CONT.PAYMENT_FREQUENCY LEFT JOIN HELPER_TABLE REBATE_PL ON REBATE_PL.HELPER_TABLE_SID = RS_CONT.REBATE_PLAN_LEVEL WHERE RS_CONT.RS_CONTRACT_SID LIKE '?'

SELECT COUNT( DISTINCT IM.ITEM_MASTER_SID) FROM PS_CONTRACT PS_C JOIN PS_CONTRACT_DETAILS PS_D ON PS_D.PS_CONTRACT_SID = PS_C.PS_CONTRACT_SID AND PS_C.PS_CONTRACT_SID LIKE '?' JOIN IFP_CONTRACT IFP ON IFP.IFP_CONTRACT_SID = PS_C.IFP_CONTRACT_SID JOIN ITEM_MASTER IM ON IM.ITEM_MASTER_SID = PS_D.ITEM_MASTER_SID LEFT JOIN BRAND_MASTER BM ON BM.BRAND_MASTER_SID = IM.BRAND_MASTER_SID LEFT JOIN HELPER_TABLE ST ON ST.HELPER_TABLE_SID = IM.ITEM_STATUS LEFT JOIN HELPER_TABLE NET_BASE_PRICE ON NET_BASE_PRICE.HELPER_TABLE_SID = PS_D.NET_BASE_PRICE LEFT JOIN HELPER_TABLE NET_SUBSEQUENT_PERIOD_PRICE ON NET_SUBSEQUENT_PERIOD_PRICE.HELPER_TABLE_SID = PS_D.NET_SUBSEQUENT_PERIOD_PRICE LEFT JOIN HELPER_TABLE RESET_ELIGIBLE ON RESET_ELIGIBLE.HELPER_TABLE_SID = PS_D.RESET_ELIGIBLE LEFT JOIN HELPER_TABLE RESET_TYPE ON RESET_TYPE.HELPER_TABLE_SID = PS_D.RESET_TYPE LEFT JOIN HELPER_TABLE PRICE_TOLERANCE_INTERVAL ON PRICE_TOLERANCE_INTERVAL.HELPER_TABLE_SID = PS_D.PRICE_TOLERANCE_INTERVAL LEFT JOIN HELPER_TABLE PRICE_TOLERANCE_FREQUENCY ON PRICE_TOLERANCE_FREQUENCY.HELPER_TABLE_SID = PS_D.PRICE_TOLERANCE_FREQUENCY LEFT JOIN HELPER_TABLE PRICE_TOLERANCE_TYPE ON PRICE_TOLERANCE_TYPE.HELPER_TABLE_SID = PS_D.PRICE_TOLERANCE_TYPE LEFT JOIN HELPER_TABLE RESET_INTERVAL ON RESET_INTERVAL.HELPER_TABLE_SID = PS_D.RESET_INTERVAL LEFT JOIN HELPER_TABLE RESET_FREQUENCY ON RESET_FREQUENCY.HELPER_TABLE_SID = PS_D.RESET_FREQUENCY LEFT JOIN HELPER_TABLE NET_PRICE_TYPE ON NET_PRICE_TYPE.HELPER_TABLE_SID = PS_D.NET_PRICE_TYPE LEFT JOIN HELPER_TABLE NET_RESET_PRICE_TYPE ON NET_RESET_PRICE_TYPE.HELPER_TABLE_SID = PS_D.NET_RESET_PRICE_TYPE LEFT JOIN HELPER_TABLE BASE_PRICE_TYPE ON BASE_PRICE_TYPE.HELPER_TABLE_SID = PS_D.BASE_PRICE_TYPE LEFT JOIN ITEM_PRICING_QUALIFIER RESET_PRICE_TYPE ON RESET_PRICE_TYPE.ITEM_PRICING_QUALIFIER_SID = PS_D.RESET_PRICE_TYPE LEFT JOIN ITEM_PRICING_QUALIFIER PRICE_PROTECTION_PRICE_TYPE ON PRICE_PROTECTION_PRICE_TYPE.ITEM_PRICING_QUALIFIER_SID = PS_D.PRICE_PROTECTION_PRICE_TYPE LEFT JOIN ITEM_PRICING_QUALIFIER SUBSEQUENT_PERIOD_PRICE_TYPE ON SUBSEQUENT_PERIOD_PRICE_TYPE.ITEM_PRICING_QUALIFIER_SID = PS_D.SUBSEQUENT_PERIOD_PRICE_TYPE JOIN ITEM_PRICING_QUALIFIER IPQ ON IPQ.ITEM_PRICING_QUALIFIER_SID = PS_D.ITEM_PRICING_QUALIFIER_SID ?

SELECT DISTINCT IM.ITEM_NO AS ITEM_NO, IM.ITEM_NAME AS ITEM_NAME, BM.BRAND_NAME AS BRAND, PS_D.PRICE_PROTECTION_STATUS, PS_D.PRICE_PROTECTION_START_DATE, PS_D.PRICE_PROTECTION_END_DATE, PS_D.PRICE_PROTECTION_PRICE_TYPE as MEASUREMENT_PRICE, PS_D.NEP, PS_D.NEP_FORMULA, PS_D.BASE_PRICE_TYPE, PS_D.NET_BASE_PRICE as BASELINE_NET_WAC, PS_D.NET_BASE_PRICE_FORMULA_ID as NET_BASELINE_WAC_FORMULA, PS_D.SUBSEQUENT_PERIOD_PRICE_TYPE, PS_D.NET_SUBSEQUENT_PERIOD_PRICE, PS_D.NET_SUBSEQUENT_PRICE_FORMULA_ID as NET_SUBSEQUENT_PERIOD_PRICE_FORMULA, PS_D.PRICE_TOLERANCE_INTERVAL, PS_D.PRICE_TOLERANCE_FREQUENCY, PS_D.PRICE_TOLERANCE_TYPE, PS_D.PRICE_TOLERANCE, PS_D.MAX_INCREMENTAL_CHANGE, PS_D.RESET_ELIGIBLE, PS_D.RESET_TYPE, PS_D.RESET_DATE, PS_D.RESET_INTERVAL, PS_D.RESET_FREQUENCY, PS_D.RESET_PRICE_TYPE, PS_D.NET_RESET_PRICE_TYPE, PS_D.NET_RESET_PRICE_FORMULA_ID as NET_RESET_PRICE_FORMULA, PS_D.NET_PRICE_TYPE, PS_D.NET_PRICE_TYPE_FORMULA, PS_C.PS_CONTRACT_ATTACHED_DATE AS ATTACHED_DATE, PRICE_PROTECTION_PRICE_TYPE.ITEM_PRICING_QUALIFIER_NAME AS MEASUREMENT_PRICE_DESC, SUBSEQUENT_PERIOD_PRICE_TYPE.ITEM_PRICING_QUALIFIER_NAME AS SUBSEQUENT_PERIOD_PRICE_TYPE_DESC, RESET_PRICE_TYPE.ITEM_PRICING_QUALIFIER_NAME AS RESET_PRICE_TYPE_DESC, PS_D.BASE_PRICE_ENTRY as BASELINE_WAC_MANUAL, PS_D.BASE_PRICE_DATE as BASELINE_WAC_DATE, PS_D.BASE_PRICE_DDLB as BASELINE_WAC_PRICE_TYPE, IM.ITEM_MASTER_SID FROM PS_CONTRACT PS_C JOIN PS_CONTRACT_DETAILS PS_D ON PS_D.PS_CONTRACT_SID = PS_C.PS_CONTRACT_SID AND PS_C.PS_CONTRACT_SID LIKE '?' JOIN IFP_CONTRACT IFP ON IFP.IFP_CONTRACT_SID = PS_C.IFP_CONTRACT_SID JOIN ITEM_MASTER IM ON IM.ITEM_MASTER_SID = PS_D.ITEM_MASTER_SID left JOIN BRAND_MASTER BM ON BM.BRAND_MASTER_SID = IM.BRAND_MASTER_SID left JOIN HELPER_TABLE ST ON ST.HELPER_TABLE_SID = IM.ITEM_STATUS LEFT JOIN ITEM_PRICING_QUALIFIER IPQ ON IPQ.ITEM_PRICING_QUALIFIER_SID = PS_D.ITEM_PRICING_QUALIFIER_SID
LEFT JOIN HELPER_TABLE NET_BASE_PRICE ON NET_BASE_PRICE.HELPER_TABLE_SID = PS_D.NET_BASE_PRICE LEFT JOIN HELPER_TABLE NET_SUBSEQUENT_PERIOD_PRICE ON NET_SUBSEQUENT_PERIOD_PRICE.HELPER_TABLE_SID = PS_D.NET_SUBSEQUENT_PERIOD_PRICE LEFT JOIN HELPER_TABLE RESET_ELIGIBLE ON RESET_ELIGIBLE.HELPER_TABLE_SID = PS_D.RESET_ELIGIBLE LEFT JOIN HELPER_TABLE RESET_TYPE ON RESET_TYPE.HELPER_TABLE_SID = PS_D.RESET_TYPE LEFT JOIN HELPER_TABLE PRICE_TOLERANCE_INTERVAL ON PRICE_TOLERANCE_INTERVAL.HELPER_TABLE_SID = PS_D.PRICE_TOLERANCE_INTERVAL LEFT JOIN HELPER_TABLE PRICE_TOLERANCE_FREQUENCY ON PRICE_TOLERANCE_FREQUENCY.HELPER_TABLE_SID = PS_D.PRICE_TOLERANCE_FREQUENCY LEFT JOIN HELPER_TABLE PRICE_TOLERANCE_TYPE ON PRICE_TOLERANCE_TYPE.HELPER_TABLE_SID = PS_D.PRICE_TOLERANCE_TYPE LEFT JOIN HELPER_TABLE RESET_INTERVAL ON RESET_INTERVAL.HELPER_TABLE_SID = PS_D.RESET_INTERVAL LEFT JOIN HELPER_TABLE RESET_FREQUENCY ON RESET_FREQUENCY.HELPER_TABLE_SID = PS_D.RESET_FREQUENCY LEFT JOIN HELPER_TABLE NET_PRICE_TYPE ON NET_PRICE_TYPE.HELPER_TABLE_SID = PS_D.NET_PRICE_TYPE LEFT JOIN HELPER_TABLE NET_RESET_PRICE_TYPE ON NET_RESET_PRICE_TYPE.HELPER_TABLE_SID = PS_D.NET_RESET_PRICE_TYPE LEFT JOIN HELPER_TABLE BASE_PRICE_TYPE ON BASE_PRICE_TYPE.HELPER_TABLE_SID = PS_D.BASE_PRICE_TYPE LEFT JOIN ITEM_PRICING_QUALIFIER RESET_PRICE_TYPE ON RESET_PRICE_TYPE.ITEM_PRICING_QUALIFIER_SID = PS_D.RESET_PRICE_TYPE LEFT JOIN ITEM_PRICING_QUALIFIER PRICE_PROTECTION_PRICE_TYPE ON PRICE_PROTECTION_PRICE_TYPE.ITEM_PRICING_QUALIFIER_SID = PS_D.PRICE_PROTECTION_PRICE_TYPE LEFT JOIN ITEM_PRICING_QUALIFIER SUBSEQUENT_PERIOD_PRICE_TYPE ON SUBSEQUENT_PERIOD_PRICE_TYPE.ITEM_PRICING_QUALIFIER_SID = PS_D.SUBSEQUENT_PERIOD_PRICE_TYPE
LEFT JOIN HELPER_TABLE PTI ON PTI.HELPER_TABLE_SID = PS_D.PRICE_TOLERANCE_INTERVAL LEFT JOIN HELPER_TABLE PTF ON PTF.HELPER_TABLE_SID = PS_D.PRICE_TOLERANCE_FREQUENCY LEFT JOIN HELPER_TABLE PTT ON PTT.HELPER_TABLE_SID = PS_D.PRICE_TOLERANCE_TYPE ? ORDER BY IM.ITEM_MASTER_SID OFFSET ? ROWS FETCH NEXT ? ROWS ONLY

SELECT PS.PS_ID,PS.PS_NO, PS_C.PS_NAME, ST.DESCRIPTION, PS_C.PS_TYPE, PS_C.PS_START_DATE, PS_C.PS_END_DATE FROM PS_CONTRACT PS_C JOIN PS_MODEL PS ON PS.PS_MODEL_SID = PS_C.PS_MODEL_SID JOIN HELPER_TABLE ST ON ST.HELPER_TABLE_SID = PS_C.PS_STATUS WHERE PS_C.PS_CONTRACT_SID LIKE '?'

SELECT Count(*) FROM (SELECT DISTINCT IM.ITEM_NO AS NO, IM.ITEM_NAME AS NAME, BR.BRAND_NAME AS BRAND, ST.DESCRIPTION AS STAT, IM.ITEM_START_DATE AS STARDATE, IM.ITEM_END_DATE AS ENDDATE, IFP_D.IFP_CONTRACT_ATTACHED_DATE AS ATTACHED FROM IFP_CONTRACT IFP_C JOIN IFP_CONTRACT_DETAILS IFP_D ON IFP_D.IFP_CONTRACT_SID = IFP_C.IFP_CONTRACT_SID AND IFP_C.IFP_CONTRACT_SID LIKE '?' JOIN CFP_CONTRACT CFP ON CFP.CFP_CONTRACT_SID = IFP_C.CFP_CONTRACT_SID JOIN ITEM_MASTER IM ON IM.ITEM_MASTER_SID = IFP_D.ITEM_MASTER_SID JOIN BRAND_MASTER BR ON BR.BRAND_MASTER_SID = IM.BRAND_MASTER_SID JOIN HELPER_TABLE ST ON ST.HELPER_TABLE_SID = IM.ITEM_STATUS ? ) IFP

SELECT DISTINCT IM.ITEM_NO AS NO, IM.ITEM_NAME AS NAME, BR.BRAND_NAME AS BRAND, ST.DESCRIPTION AS STAT, IM.ITEM_START_DATE AS STARDATE, IM.ITEM_END_DATE AS ENDDATE, IFP_D.IFP_CONTRACT_ATTACHED_DATE AS ATTACHED, IM.ITEM_MASTER_SID FROM IFP_CONTRACT IFP_C JOIN IFP_CONTRACT_DETAILS IFP_D ON IFP_D.IFP_CONTRACT_SID = IFP_C.IFP_CONTRACT_SID AND IFP_C.IFP_CONTRACT_SID LIKE '?' JOIN CFP_CONTRACT CFP ON CFP.CFP_CONTRACT_SID = IFP_C.CFP_CONTRACT_SID JOIN ITEM_MASTER IM ON IM.ITEM_MASTER_SID = IFP_D.ITEM_MASTER_SID JOIN BRAND_MASTER BR ON BR.BRAND_MASTER_SID = IM.BRAND_MASTER_SID JOIN HELPER_TABLE ST ON ST.HELPER_TABLE_SID = IM.ITEM_STATUS ?
ORDER BY IM.ITEM_MASTER_SID OFFSET ? ROWS FETCH NEXT ? ROWS ONLY

SELECT IFP.IFP_ID,IFP.IFP_NO, IFP.IFP_NAME, HT.DESCRIPTION, IFP_C.IFP_TYPE, IFP_C.IFP_START_DATE, IFP_C.IFP_END_DATE FROM IFP_CONTRACT IFP_C JOIN IFP_MODEL IFP ON IFP.IFP_MODEL_SID = IFP_C.IFP_MODEL_SID JOIN HELPER_TABLE HT ON HT.HELPER_TABLE_SID = IFP_C.IFP_STATUS WHERE IFP_C.IFP_CONTRACT_SID LIKE '?'

SELECT Count(*) FROM (
SELECT DISTINCT CM.COMPANY_NO AS NO, CM.COMPANY_NAME AS NAME, CST.DESCRIPTION AS COMPANY_STATUS, CFP_D.COMPANY_START_DATE, CFP_D.COMPANY_END_DATE, ST.DESCRIPTION AS STAT, TRAD.DESCRIPTION AS TRADE, CFP_D.CFP_CONTRACT_ATTACHED_DATE FROM CFP_CONTRACT CFP_C JOIN CFP_CONTRACT_DETAILS CFP_D ON CFP_C.CFP_CONTRACT_SID = CFP_C.CFP_CONTRACT_SID AND CFP_D.CFP_CONTRACT_SID LIKE '?' LEFT JOIN COMPANY_MASTER CM ON CM.COMPANY_MASTER_SID = CFP_D.COMPANY_MASTER_SID LEFT JOIN HELPER_TABLE ST ON ST.HELPER_TABLE_SID = CFP_D.CFP_CONTRACT_ATTACHED_STATUS LEFT JOIN HELPER_TABLE CST ON CST.HELPER_TABLE_SID = CM.COMPANY_STATUS LEFT JOIN HELPER_TABLE TRAD ON TRAD.HELPER_TABLE_SID = CFP_D.TRADE_CLASS ? ) CFP

SELECT DISTINCT CM.COMPANY_NO AS NO, CM.COMPANY_NAME AS NAME, CST.DESCRIPTION AS COMPANY_STATUS, CFP_D.COMPANY_START_DATE, CFP_D.COMPANY_END_DATE, ST.DESCRIPTION AS STAT, TRAD.DESCRIPTION AS TRADE, CFP_D.CFP_CONTRACT_ATTACHED_DATE FROM CFP_CONTRACT CFP_C JOIN CFP_CONTRACT_DETAILS CFP_D ON CFP_C.CFP_CONTRACT_SID = CFP_C.CFP_CONTRACT_SID AND CFP_D.CFP_CONTRACT_SID LIKE '?' LEFT JOIN COMPANY_MASTER CM ON CM.COMPANY_MASTER_SID = CFP_D.COMPANY_MASTER_SID LEFT JOIN HELPER_TABLE ST ON ST.HELPER_TABLE_SID = CFP_D.CFP_CONTRACT_ATTACHED_STATUS LEFT JOIN HELPER_TABLE CST ON CST.HELPER_TABLE_SID = CM.COMPANY_STATUS LEFT JOIN HELPER_TABLE TRAD ON TRAD.HELPER_TABLE_SID = CFP_D.TRADE_CLASS ? ORDER BY CM.COMPANY_NO OFFSET ? ROWS FETCH NEXT ? ROWS ONLY

SELECT CFP.CFP_ID, CFP.CFP_NO, CFP.CFP_NAME, HT.DESCRIPTION, TYP.DESCRIPTION AS TY, CFP_C.CFP_START_DATE, CFP_C.CFP_END_DATE FROM CFP_CONTRACT CFP_C JOIN CFP_MODEL CFP ON CFP.CFP_MODEL_SID = CFP_C.CFP_MODEL_SID LEFT JOIN HELPER_TABLE HT ON HT.HELPER_TABLE_SID = CFP_C.CFP_STATUS LEFT JOIN HELPER_TABLE TYP ON TYP.HELPER_TABLE_SID = CFP_C.CFP_TYPE WHERE CFP_C.CFP_CONTRACT_SID LIKE '?'
